name: test_multi_stage_detection
description: Verify that the multi_stage_build_optimization capability can correctly identify a single-stage Dockerfile and suggest a split.
input_data:
FROM golang:1.21
WORKDIR /app
COPY . .
RUN go build -o main .
ENTRYPOINT ["./main"]
expected_result: A list of recommended changes including a builder stage and a final runtime stage.
